ComicInfo.Title: Darkness, Once Gazed Upon Part One
ComicInfo.Summary: “War Stories.” 2000 years ago, the War of the Three-Fold Spark came to a close, ending an unprecedented era of violence on Cybertron and clearing a way for a bold new era. But two kilocycles is practically nothing to the incredibly long-lived Cybertronians, so what answers can Cyclonus and Pyra Magna find in their past to help them survive the new battles of the present?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 23:02:43. [CVDB895325]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Andrew Dalhouse, Ed Pirrie, John-Paul Bove
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Aline Baumgartner, Andrew Dalhouse, Freddie E. Williams II, Sebastian Piriz
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Genre: Science Fiction, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha
ComicInfo.Characters: Astrotrain, Codexa, Cyclonus, Flamewar, Flatline, Groove, Highbrow, Hyperdrive, Ironhide, Nominus Prime, Optimus Prime, Roughstuff, Ruckus, Rumble, Shadow Stalker, Shockwave, Skytread, Slipstream, Swindle, Termagax, Tracer, Ultra Magnus
